label: 鎮撫使
説明文: In the Nara Period, in the 3rd year of Tempyō (731), this extraordinary post was appointed for the three main roads of San’yō, San’in, and Nankai. They functioned as security officials and  monitored the administration of provincial governors and district officials. This post was called sōkan (惣管) in the Kinai. [山陽、山陰、南海、畿内]
